//: This is the default pristine environment configuration for a Pyvider provider.

env.//: Mode can be 'passthrough' (allow all env vars) or 'restricted' (use an allowlist).

set.//: These variables will be force-set in the Python environment.

policy.//: Defines runtime security policies enforced by the Go launcher.

network.//: If allow is false, only these hosts would be connectable.

filesystem.//: Defines additional paths the provider is allowed to read/write.
